channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- PDF Flipbook, 3D Flipbook WordPress – DearFlip
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- PDF Flipbook, 3D Flipbook WordPress – DearFlip

item.title: CVE-2021-24732|2024-08-03T19:42:16.680Z -- unknown -- pdf%20flipbook%2C%203d%20flipbook%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20dearflip
item.description: The PDF Flipbook, 3D Flipbook WordPress – DearFlip WordPress plugin before 1.7.10 does not escape the class attribute of its shortcode before outputting it back in an attribute, which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
